newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish Lentex IPO seen largely oversubscribed.
newsitem.headline: Polish Lentex IPO seen largely oversubscribed.

text.p: Polish carpet maker Lentex SA'S initial public offering of 1.5-million shares, which ended on Wednesday, is likely to be largely oversubscribed, the deputy president of the company said on Thursday.
"We are expecting a large oversubcription, the issue is very successful," Alfred Jarzombek told Reuters.
He said the shares, which were priced at 21.5 zlotys each, would be alloted on Tuesday next week and the company would probably announce the subscription results on Wednesday.
He also said the company, which seeks a main market listing, was likely to enter the bourse in late March or early in April.
